text: The Eagle's Feather is an American silent Western movie from 1923 that stars James Kirkwood and Mary Alden. It was directed by Edward Sloman. Metro Pictures made it and sent it to theatres. == Cast == == Preservation status == A copy of The Eagle's Feather is held in the Gosfilmofond Archive. == References == == Other websites == * * * Stills at silentfilmstillarchive.com Category:American romance movies Category:1923 romance movies Category:1923 movies Category:Pages with unreviewed translations
title: The Eagle's Feather
